mapper.select:
select t.id,t.user_id,t1.real_name,t1.lesson_id,(select name from lesson where id = t.lesson_id) as lessonName, t.direction,t.normal,t.normal_present,t.training,t.training_present,t.type,t.create_time,t.creator from teach_class_hours_flow_record as t left join sys_user t1 on t.user_id = t1.id where t.deleted = 0
and t1.real_name like concat('%',#{query.userName},'%')
and t.type = #{query.type}
order by t.create_time desc
